title: ZZ ROT PORTAL ? WHERE ARE U I MISS U :(

replies.body:
i think its this bug. has to do with minions not moving and gathering in base
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_At2ce1Wh3E

or you can youtube search zz rot bug
I play Yorick and am in the same boat, fix it riot pls!
Well that explains why I am enjoying the game more then normal.
Agreed, time to play as much League as I can while that thing's still gone

> [{quoted}](name=Irelia Bot,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=JmVFi9YL,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-12-08T05:44:49.903+0000)
>
> Well that explains why I am enjoying the game more then normal.

yeah.  that sht is obnoxious  on champions like yorick and nasus  who can already take a tower in less than 10 seconds cause of tri force
CRIES i build this every game first item

i do so too on a lot of champions

easy tilting of enemy for easy games ^^
well i use it to take tower easy its very surprising how much one exrta winion  can help u

Yes it helps a lot i sometimes tank the tower myself with the one extra minion nearby to reduce armor and then have the zzrot demolish it quicker

I also have many many more uses for it 

i also use it as a ward, you put it further away from a lane and let the voidlings follow a whole trajectory through jungle and river into a lane, the voidlings give vision so by doing this you can gain the vision amount equal to 4 wards when placed in some area's, one of my favorite uses of the portal

I also use it as a portable wall, place it right in front of someone you know is going to flash a wall to extend the walls thickness and poof wallflash ^^ so cheesy or to place down a wall for the poppy's and vayne's on my team or to block pathways and force enemies to walk around it so you can gain greater distance when running away or slow them down if they try to escape ^^

You can even use it to trap people between a wall a pink ward and the portal for an ''infinite'' root, at least untill they destroy the pink or portal, in case of no nearby wall you can use your own fat body if you play a tank
This is my favorite thing to do when someone tries to turret dive me it's so cheesy x'D 

And it gives move speed near the portal which can be useful in many situations for example when running away or in a teamfight

And i use it for so many more things it's crazy really

oooo nice i gota try it as ward and to block thm in place whn they tower dive XD thts instant slat triggered 
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
void creeps have a national holiday, they are absent!
At least games will be shorter for now lol
